paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR Val30Met variant, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: Vitreous amyloidosis as the initial manifestation of FAP

individual_records.phenotype_details: Vitreous opacities, asymptomatic first-degree AV block
individual_records.evidence_sentence: We report a case of vitreous opacities as the initial manifestation of FAP TTR Val30Met in a late-onset Portuguese patient without a history of FAP.

functional_data.summary: The TTR Val30Met mutation is associated with systemic accumulation of amyloidogenic TTR.
assays: Pathological examination with Congo red stain

variants.segregation_data: No evidence of FAP in any of the patient's relatives.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and mutation association.
variants.additional_notes: The patient had no family history of FAP, and the mutation was identified through full sequencing.
key_quotes: The mutation TTR Val30Met was identified by full sequencing of the gene.
The patient remains free of neurologic symptoms or signs.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper focused on a single case with a specific TTR variant.
